text: Yabuusia ebebusi bebe nabara khushisaala shishie shiobwaami, ne boosi nibamwinamila, naye naboola mbu â€œ ewe papa wanje kano niko amakalukhasio kamaloro kanje kalia, Nyasaye amalile okhukakhola katoto. Ne toto yakholela amalayi olwa yandusia mumboye, mana nabarera okhurula mushitsimi, shetani namalile okhutswatswania hakari wanje nende Abana befu, toto Nyasaye wanje niwokhukhola elia yenya, toto ye ni Omumanyi owamachesi muno
